posts.title: Getting Started
posts.body: This is my first post. I'm excited to get started with this platform and share my thoughts with everyone. Looking forward to learning and growing.

posts.title: JavaScript Basics
posts.body: JavaScript is a versatile language used for both client-side and server-side applications. I'm starting with the basics, like variables, functions, and control flow.

posts.title: React Hooks Deep Dive
posts.body: React hooks have revolutionized how we manage state and side effects in functional components. Today, I explored `useState`, `useEffect`, and custom hooks.

posts.title: API Fundamentals
posts.body: APIs are an essential part of modern web development. I learned about RESTful APIs, how to make GET and POST requests, and handle responses using fetch.

posts.title: CSS Grid Layout
posts.body: CSS Grid is a powerful layout system that allows for the creation of complex, responsive layouts with ease. I've been experimenting with grid-template-rows and columns.

posts.title: Database Design 101
posts.body: Good database design is the foundation of scalable applications. I covered the basics of normalization, relationships, and indexing for optimized performance.

posts.title: Routes
posts.body: this post is all about routes
